detailsData.title: Educating Attorneys
detailsData.content: Educates attorneys and HR Professionals regarding California employment laws.

detailsData.title: Professional Guidance
detailsData.content: Helps you understand how the law affects your rights and responsibilities.

address: 5820 Stoneridge Mall Road, Suite 207, Pleasanton, CA 94588
valueProp: Dedicated to protecting the workplace. The Nuddleman Law Firm represents employers and employees, giving us an advantage over firms that only focus on one side or the other.

testimonalData.text: I have received excellent legal advice and representation from the Nuddleman Law Firm. Highly recommended!
testimonalData.author: John Doe

testimonalData.text: The team at Nuddleman Law Firm is professional and knowledgeable. They helped me navigate a complex employment issue with ease.
testimonalData.author: Jane Smith

testimonalData.text: I am grateful for the support and guidance provided by the attorneys at Nuddleman Law Firm. They truly care about their clients.
testimonalData.author: Alice Johnson
